meanings.sent1: The idea of a flying elephant is absurd.
meanings.sent2: It is absurd to think that pigs can fly.
meanings.sent3: The absurd notion of a talking tree made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation for being late was so absurd, it was like saying the moon is made of cheese.
meanings.sent5: The absurdity of wearing a winter coat in the scorching heat was hard to ignore.

meanings.definition: Contrary to all reason or common sense; laughably foolish or false
meanings.sent1: His absurd excuse for not doing his homework was that aliens stole it.
meanings.sent2: The claim that the earth is flat is completely absurd.
meanings.sent3: The absurd story of a cat driving a car was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was so absurdly abstract, it seemed like a dream on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The absurdity of a fish riding a bicycle was a hilarious image in his mind.
